body: Just got to 500 post and I thought I would do an AMA. So ask away :P
body_tagged: Just got to 500 post and I thought I would do an AMA. So ask away :P
title: 500 Post's AMA

replies.body:
What is your favorite thing to do in Minecraft besides PVP?
Have you ever eaten fried worms?
Do you have a phone? If so, what kind? If not, do you want one?
What kind of computer mouse do you have?
Do you own any pets?
Soup or Salad?
doge?

replies.body:
What is your favorite thing to do in Minecraft besides PVP? Rushing or partying

Have you ever eaten fried worms? Nupe

Do you have a phone? If so, what kind? If not, do you want one? Yes,I have a Samsung Evergreen

What kind of computer mouse do you have? Logitech

Do you own any pets? 2 dogs and a lot of cats....

Soup or Salad? Soup

doge? Yes pls
